General.Name: Zoned Properties Inc
General.Description: Zoned Properties, Inc., a real estate development firm, owns, develops, operates, and leases a portfolio of commercial properties in the United States. It provides site identification, advisory, and brokerage services for the cannabis real estate sector. The company was formerly known as Vanguard Minerals Corporation and changed its name to Zoned Properties Inc. in October 2013. Zoned Properties Inc. was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Scottsdale, Arizona.
General.Address: 8360 East Raintree Drive, Scottsdale, AZ, United States, 85260
